hero.description: A research platform exploring the hidden rhythms of human connection. Add the people you care about, tap when they cross your mind, and discover whether your thoughts align — without ever being told in real time.

intro.step1.desc: Sign up with a unique username that your connections will use to find you.

intro.step2.desc: Search for people by username and add them to your circle.
intro.step3.title: Tap When You Think of Them
intro.step3.desc: A simple heart tap records the moment — no notification is sent.
intro.step4.title: Discover at 11 PM
intro.step4.desc: Each night, see a summary of who thought about you in the past 7 days.
